Package ds.made.jdbc.easy.utility

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DateUtils
    Utility for convertion java.sql.Date to java.util.Date and vice versa.
    DBClosingManager
    Utility for easy closing standard Statement connections.
    DBHelper
    Utility for reading data from ResultSet.
    EasyColumnClassFieldFactory
    Utility for creating EasyColumnClassField fields.
    Lobs
    Utility for handling Oracle CLOB and BLOB objects.
    NamedParameterCallableStatement
    This class wraps around a CallableStatement and allows the programmer to set parameters by name instead of by index.
    NamedParameterPreparedStatement
    This class wraps around a PreparedStatement and allows the programmer to set parameters by name instead of by index.
    NamedParameterUtils  
    OracleParameterFactory
    Simplified creation of Oracle database parameters.
    Parameter
    Parameter class that is mapped to a ?
